channel.title: Known bugs, glitches and fixes + suggestions
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I downloaded Black Mesa: Source a week ago and I have to say the developers did a really goodjob on recreating the original title. I played this game three times I still can't get enough it, I absolutely love this mod. However, I encountered numerous of bugs and glitches in the game. On the first play I did notice some bugs like crashing, stuttering, low frames, ect... But in the second play through, I did some 'Nitpicking' and notice some more bugs. Some are very minor but some are sort of major types and needs fixing. I did some searching through the community forums for any fixes that people created and I searched through the web too. Here is a list of bugs I encountered, they're categorized in major to minor bugs. I also placed fixes for some of these issues. These fixes may work but aren't 100% guaranteed. Credits go to whoever created the fixes.
[COLOR='Red']MAJOR[/SIZE]
-[b][COLOR='Red']Low Frames, Stuttering and Freezing[/SIZE][/b] I'm not a computer enthusiast, I have a sort of mainstream PC. But I have noticed across the forums people have been complaining about this problem, even with an expensive computer. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13155[/url] [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13658[/url] [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13281[/url] This fix is for quad cores or more! If you do not have a quad core or more then I don't recommend to use this fix: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12660[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Red']Game crashes[/SIZE][/b] I get random crashes if I play the game too long, for example: From Blast Pit to Surface Tension, I would crash somewhere there. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Red']A.I ignores you[/SIZE][/b] Especially when you get to the Hydro Dam, there is a group of soldiers walking towards the Dam, if you kill one at the front they keep walking. I also noticed the A.I ignores each other too, the part where the Gargantua bursts through the door in the tunnel, there are two soldiers next to the door and the Gargantua just ignores them. Possibly scripted to kill you first? -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Red']Particle effects cause FPS drops[/SIZE][/b] The smoke effect form the damaged Anti-Mass Spectrometer, the concrete dust and the turret muzzle flash or smoke effect causes some FPS drops. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] This reduces the smoke effect in the Test Chamber: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14361[/url] Currently WIP, but dsd is creating a Particle Improvement Pack, check it out: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13827[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Red']Game not loading saved game properly[/SIZE][/b] The game sometimes reloads manually saved games but not autosaves -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Red']Train elevator won't go up[/SIZE][/b] In the chapter On a rail, after parking the train on the elevator with the turrets, the elevator won't go up. I couldn't reverse on the train either. I had to walk on foot to the next train. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Red']Ladders[/SIZE][/b] The ladders are very glitchy at the moment, it's hard to get off of them and going up and down. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Red']Very long loading times[/SIZE][/b] It could be my computer but other source engine games like Portal 2 and Left 4 Dead 2 takes seconds than a minute on Black Mesa. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Red']Game is too hard[/SIZE][/b] I don't know about some of you guys, but I thought Black Mesa was a little too hard and unbalanced, especially when you verse the Apache on the cliff side. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] An addon was created called Black Mesa: Re-Balanced by hajducek, check it out: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13608[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Red']Crosshair disappears after zooming out of crossbow[/SIZE][/b] Sometimes after I zoom out of the crossbow, my crosshair disappears. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] Quick work around: Just press Esc then resume game.
[COLOR='Orange']MINOR[/SIZE]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Snarks ignore aliens?[/SIZE][/b] I don't really remember in the original, but if you deploy Snarks at aliens, they attack them. But in Black Mesa they don't go for the aliens anymore and I find this weapon useless. I don't know if this is a feature or a bug. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Autoaim is always checked[/SIZE][/b] Always checks itself again after restarting the game -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Grenade throwing distance[/SIZE][/b] Throwing distance for the grenade is too low. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Jumping height is too low[/SIZE][/b] Carlos Montero considered this as a feature so we get used to Crouch-Jumping, story here: [url]https://www.kotaku.com.au/2012/10/black-mesa-developers-made-some-changes-to-enhance-half-life/[/url] -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] Located at: <Steam installation folder>\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS\cfg\skill.cfg Find and change these to: bms_normal_jump_vertical_speed "200" bms_normal_jump_crouch_vertical_speed "200"
-[b][COLOR='Orange']MP5 clip size too big[/SIZE][/b] I noticed the ammo for the MP5 is way out of proportion with the actual gun. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120804[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']MP5 front sight[/SIZE][/b] There is suppose to be a stick inside the front sight of the MP5. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/121037[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Crossbow bolts way too big[/SIZE][/b] Crossbow bolts are heaps bigger than the ones that come in the clip and the viewmodel bolt. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120755[/url] Also to match the bolts with the clip: [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120836[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Tau cannon missing animation[/SIZE][/b] When you sprint with the Tau cannon then stop, you'll notice the Tau cannon just instantly goes up without any animation. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Skybox becomes brighter when turning on flashlight[/SIZE][/b] In Surface Tension, during the cliff side part, when you turn on your flashlight the entire skybox becomes brighter somehow. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Crossbow reloading sound out of sync[/SIZE][/b] I noticed the reloading sound for the crossbow is out of sync with the reload animation. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/sounds/17883[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Gibbed Barney missing yellow strips on pants, gibbed Houndeye has light blue strips instead of violet, standard zombie pants don't match with normal scientist pants[/SIZE][/b] Bunch of texture bugs I found. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] Barney's pants: [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120837[/url] Houndeye's strips: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14733[/url] Zombie pants: [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120784[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Combine sniper muzzle trail[/SIZE][/b] The sniper has a combine weapon from Half-Life 2, muzzle trail glows blue. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] [url]https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120823[/url]
-[b][COLOR='Orange']Alien slave looking at something else[/SIZE][/b] During in the test chamber where you get teleported all over the place, the part with the four alien slaves, they don't look at you, they look at something next to you. The same with G-man in Office Complex, he doesn't look at you, only next to you. -[b][COLOR='Lime']Fixes?[/b] None
[COLOR='Yellow']SUGGESTIONS[/SIZE]
-[b][COLOR='Yellow']Leeches?[/SIZE][/b] Do remember clearly there were leeches in Half-Life 1, how come none in Black Mesa?
-[b][COLOR='Yellow']Combat stance for alien slave and more sounds?[/SIZE][/b] In Half-Life 2: Episode 2, the Vortigaunt would have a combat stance if being attacked, the Black Mesa one would just stand normally in an idle position. I also wondered if there is more sounds for the alien slave? Because all I'm hearing is like: "Lunnnngggggg" "Tuuuuurrrrrrrr". It would be awesome if there were more sounds.
-[b][COLOR='Yellow']HECU idle sounds[/SIZE][/b] I didn't really like the HECU idle sounds, they say, "I'm tired of playing games" or "Do it". I was thinking of like radio chatter or something like in Half-Life 1.
-[b][COLOR='Yellow']50. cal MG too strong?[/SIZE][/b] Found it kinda unrealistic how a 50. cal would blow a person up. Wouldn't it make a huge hole through a person?
Okay, this is what I encountered. I think I missed some bugs but I probably got most of them. Hope these fixes I found work :slight_smile:
And BTW if you found some more bugs and fixes, feel free to post here.
Credits go to the people who created the fixes.
If there is some grammatical errors here, then I'm sorry. Not everyone's first language is English.

item.title: Known bugs, glitches and fixes + suggestions
item.dc:creator: Tranquilizer
item.description:
Hello everyone,
I downloaded Black Mesa: Source a week ago and I have to say the developers did a really goodjob on recreating the original title. I played this game three times I still can’t get enough it, I absolutely love this mod. However, I encountered numerous of bugs and glitches in the game. On the first play I did notice some bugs like crashing, stuttering, low frames, ect… But in the second play through, I did some ‘Nitpicking’ and notice some more bugs. Some are very minor but some are sort of major types and needs fixing. I did some searching through the community forums for any fixes that people created and I searched through the web too. Here is a list of bugs I encountered, they’re categorized in major to minor bugs. I also placed fixes for some of these issues. These fixes may work but aren’t 100% guaranteed. Credits go to whoever created the fixes.

[COLOR=‘Red’]MAJOR[/SIZE]

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Low Frames, Stuttering and Freezing[/SIZE]
I’m not a computer enthusiast, I have a sort of mainstream PC. But I have noticed across the forums people have been complaining about this problem, even with an expensive computer.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13155
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13658
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13281
This fix is for quad cores or more! If you do not have a quad core or more then I don’t recommend to use this fix:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12660

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Game crashes[/SIZE]
I get random crashes if I play the game too long, for example: From Blast Pit to Surface Tension, I would crash somewhere there.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Red’]A.I ignores you[/SIZE]
Especially when you get to the Hydro Dam, there is a group of soldiers walking towards the Dam, if you kill one at the front they keep walking. I also noticed the A.I ignores each other too, the part where the Gargantua bursts through the door in the tunnel, there are two soldiers next to the door and the Gargantua just ignores them. Possibly scripted to kill you first?
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Particle effects cause FPS drops[/SIZE]
The smoke effect form the damaged Anti-Mass Spectrometer, the concrete dust and the turret muzzle flash or smoke effect causes some FPS drops.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
This reduces the smoke effect in the Test Chamber:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14361
Currently WIP, but dsd is creating a Particle Improvement Pack, check it out:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13827

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Game not loading saved game properly[/SIZE]
The game sometimes reloads manually saved games but not autosaves
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Train elevator won’t go up[/SIZE]
In the chapter On a rail, after parking the train on the elevator with the turrets, the elevator won’t go up. I couldn’t reverse on the train either. I had to walk on foot to the next train.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Ladders[/SIZE]
The ladders are very glitchy at the moment, it’s hard to get off of them and going up and down.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Very long loading times[/SIZE]
It could be my computer but other source engine games like Portal 2 and Left 4 Dead 2 takes seconds than a minute on Black Mesa.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Game is too hard[/SIZE]
I don’t know about some of you guys, but I thought Black Mesa was a little too hard and unbalanced, especially when you verse the Apache on the cliff side.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
An addon was created called Black Mesa: Re-Balanced by hajducek, check it out:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13608

-[COLOR=‘Red’]Crosshair disappears after zooming out of crossbow[/SIZE]
Sometimes after I zoom out of the crossbow, my crosshair disappears.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
Quick work around: Just press Esc then resume game.

[COLOR=‘Orange’]MINOR[/SIZE]

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Snarks ignore aliens?[/SIZE]
I don’t really remember in the original, but if you deploy Snarks at aliens, they attack them. But in Black Mesa they don’t go for the aliens anymore and I find this weapon useless. I don’t know if this is a feature or a bug.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Autoaim is always checked[/SIZE]
Always checks itself again after restarting the game
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Grenade throwing distance[/SIZE]
Throwing distance for the grenade is too low.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Jumping height is too low[/SIZE]
Carlos Montero considered this as a feature so we get used to Crouch-Jumping, story here:
https://www.kotaku.com.au/2012/10/black-mesa-developers-made-some-changes-to-enhance-half-life/
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
Located at: \steamapps\sourcemods\BMS\cfg\skill.cfg
Find and change these to:
bms_normal_jump_vertical_speed “200”
bms_normal_jump_crouch_vertical_speed “200”

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]MP5 clip size too big[/SIZE]
I noticed the ammo for the MP5 is way out of proportion with the actual gun.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120804

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]MP5 front sight[/SIZE]
There is suppose to be a stick inside the front sight of the MP5.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/121037

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Crossbow bolts way too big[/SIZE]
Crossbow bolts are heaps bigger than the ones that come in the clip and the viewmodel bolt.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120755
Also to match the bolts with the clip:
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120836

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Tau cannon missing animation[/SIZE]
When you sprint with the Tau cannon then stop, you’ll notice the Tau cannon just instantly goes up without any animation.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Skybox becomes brighter when turning on flashlight[/SIZE]
In Surface Tension, during the cliff side part, when you turn on your flashlight the entire skybox becomes brighter somehow.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Crossbow reloading sound out of sync[/SIZE]
I noticed the reloading sound for the crossbow is out of sync with the reload animation.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/sounds/17883

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Gibbed Barney missing yellow strips on pants, gibbed Houndeye has light blue strips instead of violet, standard zombie pants don’t match with normal scientist pants[/SIZE]
Bunch of texture bugs I found.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
Barney’s pants:
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120837
Houndeye’s strips:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14733
Zombie pants:
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120784

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Combine sniper muzzle trail[/SIZE]
The sniper has a combine weapon from Half-Life 2, muzzle trail glows blue.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/skins/120823

-[COLOR=‘Orange’]Alien slave looking at something else[/SIZE]
During in the test chamber where you get teleported all over the place, the part with the four alien slaves, they don’t look at you, they look at something next to you. The same with G-man in Office Complex, he doesn’t look at you, only next to you.
-[COLOR=‘Lime’]Fixes?
None

[COLOR=‘Yellow’]SUGGESTIONS[/SIZE]

-[COLOR=‘Yellow’]Leeches?[/SIZE]
Do remember clearly there were leeches in Half-Life 1, how come none in Black Mesa?

-[COLOR=‘Yellow’]Combat stance for alien slave and more sounds?[/SIZE]
In Half-Life 2: Episode 2, the Vortigaunt would have a combat stance if being attacked, the Black Mesa one would just stand normally in an idle position. I also wondered if there is more sounds for the alien slave? Because all I’m hearing is like: “Lunnnngggggg” “Tuuuuurrrrrrrr”. It would be awesome if there were more sounds.

-[COLOR=‘Yellow’]HECU idle sounds[/SIZE]
I didn’t really like the HECU idle sounds, they say, “I’m tired of playing games” or “Do it”. I was thinking of like radio chatter or something like in Half-Life 1.

-[COLOR=‘Yellow’]50. cal MG too strong?[/SIZE]
Found it kinda unrealistic how a 50. cal would blow a person up. Wouldn’t it make a huge hole through a person?

Okay, this is what I encountered. I think I missed some bugs but I probably got most of them. Hope these fixes I found work

And BTW if you found some more bugs and fixes, feel free to post here.

Credits go to the people who created the fixes.

If there is some grammatical errors here, then I’m sorry. Not everyone’s first language is English.
